{"id": "116829", "title": "Bug 116829 - Label height not updating with font size modification", "description": "Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not update immediately.
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Set the font size of a label in the UI.
2. Observe that the height of the label does not change.

OB: The label's height does not change immediately after modifying the font size.
EB: [Add expected behavior here]
SR: [Add steps to resolve the bug here]"}
